Articles.Content:
Some people just take a few days off to play Fallout 4, not Max, he takes these things SERIOUSLY

I kid, I kid, best of luck Maxmaps!

Since Turkey PhD is ready to step in, this must have been planned for a while? I hope their salt and flame resistance is ready.

Miguel, you're great. It's been so much fun having you at SQUAD for the past few years, and I think even KSP's greatest critics would congratulate you on your work. It's been amazing to work with you, and you have shaped the game and the community in a positive way. Let's hope you stick around on the forum.
May the force be with you Max...

Max? Mysteriously disappearing on Fallout 4 launch day? Never. I'm pretty sure we just never crossed paths at the office!

And baby, I'm like a cheap (and tastier) phoenix, I was born through salt and flames.

Some people just take a few days off to play Fallout 4, not Max, he takes these things SERIOUSLY

I kid, I kid, best of luck Maxmaps!

Since Turkey PhD is ready to step in, this must have been planned for a while? I hope their salt and flame resistance is ready.

Farewell Max. May the force be with you! We will all miss you and you will never be forgotten. Especially your humongous troll about a cost of exactly $0.00 for a particular KSP update on a particular livestream. That will never be forgotten.

But in all seriousness, you've made such an impact on the community and we all wish you the best of luck on your next adventure(s)!

"The open road still softly calls, like a nearly forgotten song from Childhood."

-Carl Sagan, Pale Blue Dot

I just can't believe I never got to watch Squadcasts, will he do one last Squadcast? If so I am watching it. Farewell, though.

And good luck to Dr. Turkey!
Goodbye Max, I appreciate everything you have done not only for this game, but to help inspire people to pursue careers in STEM.

Turbines to speed Miguel. Best wishes on all your future flights.

88

Farewell maxmap!

And we thank you.

That is pretty sad.

Fair seas Max.
Thank you max for your hard work! We all love this game because of the love you and the other developers put into it! As we say in World of Warships: Good luck and fair seas!
Cheers, Godspeed, and I hope you do well out in the world.

Farewell and best of wishes to Maxmaps.

You will be missed.

Bye Max, your dev tweets will not be missed.

Really, best wishes where ever you go.

Farewell, Maxmaps!

I hope the good humor and positive energy you contributed will continue at Squad; I'm sure you will take these things to any future project, and make it better.

Farewell Miguel Good luck on your new place ... and maybe, just maybe, you could go finish your Biochemistry univ degree

Edited November 11, 2015 by r_rolo1

TBH I am a bit surprised that you are leaving Squad.. I kinda hace no words to say

Good luck Maxmaps!
You'll be missed Max; you did communication better than most and took KSP to more awards and presidential palaces than most games ever reach.
Farewell, I never watched squadcast, but I appreciate your investment in this incredible game.

Well that was unexpected. I guess you do only have to give a week or two's notice of leaving a job usually, but it still feels sudden. Maxmaps, don't listen to the idiots who said you added nothing.

Meanwhile, who is Dr Turkey???
damn i hate when someone is leaving.. Farewell Mr. max..

Who indeed...

Well that was unexpected. I guess you do only have to give a week or two's notice of leaving a job usually, but it still feels sudden. Maxmaps, don't listen to the idiots who said you added nothing.

Meanwhile, who is Dr Turkey???

WHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT? Who will I make fun of on Fridays now?

I assume (and hope!) Max knows my ribbing of his play was all in good fun, and I wouldn't have watched Squadcast to do the summaries if I didn't find them enjoyable.

I hope he's leaving for greener pastures, and wish him all the best.

Now to read the past 5 pages to see who's doing Squadcast now.

UPDATE

Okay so it's this mysterious Dr_Turkey. Of course, he'll be hosting this week's Squadcast, when I'm on a long weekend and can't watch it. I should probably announce that actually...

Edited November 12, 2015 by 5thHorseman

WHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT? Who will I make fun of on Fridays now?

I assume (and hope!) Max knows my ribbing of his play was all in good fun, and I wouldn't have watched Squadcast to do the summaries if I didn't find them enjoyable.

I hope he's leaving for greener pastures, and wish him all the best.

Now to read the past 5 pages to see who's doing Squadcast now.

See directly above your post.
Godspeed Maxmaps. Sad to see you go.
